com.gracehoppers.jlovas.bookwrm

Class Book

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gracehoppers.jlovas.bookwrm.Book

  • public class Book
extends java.lang.Object
    The Book class creates instances of a book which contain the various information about the book the user would like to trade.

    The user sets the title, author, quantity, quality, category, privacy, photo, and description.

    See Also:
    AddBookScreen, ViewBookActivity.
